string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Harga RP.1.450.000,- Ukuran layar: 6,3 inci, 19.5:9 ratio, terlindungi Corning Gorilla Glass 5 Resolusi layar: IPS LCD 2340 x 1080 pixels (~409 ppi density) Chipset: Qualcomm SDM660 Snapdragon 660 (14 nm) CPU: Octa-core (4x2.2 GHz Kryo 260 dan 4x1.8 GHz Kryo 260) GPU: Adreno 512 OS: Android 9.0 (Pie); MIUI 10 RAM: 3GB/4GB/6GB Memori internal: 32GB/64 GB/128 GB Memori eksternal: microSD, up to 256 GB Ukuran HP: 159.2 x 75.2 x 8.1 mm Berat HP: 186 gram Kamera belakang: 48 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 1/2", 0.8µm, PDAF dan 5 MP, f/2.2, depth sensor Kamera depan: 13 MP, f/2.0, 1.12µm Kapasitas baterai: 4000 mAh, non-removable, Quick Charge 4 WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot Bluetooth: 5.0, A2DP, LE USB: USB Type-C 2.0 Varian warna: Nebula Red, Space Black, dan Neptune Blue Tanggal rilis: Januari 2019

Harga Rp.1.850.000,- Ukuran layar: IPS LCD, 6,3 inci, 2340 x 1080 pixels dengan Corning Gorilla Glass 5 Ukuran HP: 158.3 x 75.3 x 8.4 mm Berat HP: 190 gram Chipset: Snapdragon 665 CPU: Octa-core (4x2.0 GHz Kryo 260 Gold dan 4x1.8 GHz Kryo 260 Silver) GPU: Adreno 610 Sistem operasi: Android 9.0 Pie RAM: 3GB/4GB/6GB Memori internal: 32 GB/64 GB/128 GB Kamera depan: Single camera, 13 MP Kamera belakang: Quad camera, 48 MP ( f/1.8, 26mm wide, 1/2.0", 0.8µm, PDAF) + 8 MP (f/2.2, 120˚ ultrawide, 1/4.0", 1.12µm) + 2 MP (f/2.4, macro) + 2 MP (f/2.4, depth) Video kamera depan: 1080p@30fps Video kamera belakang: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60/120fps; gyro-EIS Kapasitas baterai: Li-Po 4000 mAh non-removable, Fast charging 18W SIM: Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot USB: USB Type-C 2.0, USB On-The-Go Sensor: Sidik jari, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass Rilis: Oktober 2019

Harga Rp.1.300.000,- Layar: IPS LCD, 6,5 inci Resolusi layar: 720 x 1560 pixels, 19.5:9 ratio (~264 ppi density) Chipset: Qualcomm SDM450 Snapdragon 450 (14 nm) OS: Android 9.0 (Pie); One UI CPU: Octa-core 1.8 GHz Cortex-A53 GPU: Adreno 506 RAM: 3GB/4GB Memori internal: 32GB/64GB Memori eksternal: microSDXC Kamera belakang: Triple camera 13 MP, f/1.8, 27mm (wide), 8 MP, f/2.2, 13mm (ultrawide), 1/4.0", 1.12µm, 5 MP, f/2.2, (depth) Kamera depan: 8 MP, f/2.0 Video: 1080p@30fps Ukuran HP: 163.3 x 77.5 x 8 mm Berat HP: 183 gram SIM card: Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot Bluetooth: 4.2, A2DP, LE USB: USB Type-C 2.0 Kapasitas baterai: Non-removable Li-Po 4.000 mAh (fast charging) Earphone: 3,5 mm audio jack Sensor: Fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass Varian warna: Black, Blue, Red, Green Tanggal rilis: September 2019

Harga Rp.1.750.000,- Ukuran layar: 6.18 inci, IPS LCD 1080 x 2246 pixels ; 18.7:9 ratio ~82.2% screen-to-body ratio; 403 ppi; Corning Gorilla Glass Chipset: Qualcomm SDM845 Snapdragon 845 (10 nm) CPU: Octa-core (4x2.8 GHz Kryo 385 Gold dan 4x1.8 GHz Kryo 385 Silver) Sistem operasi: Android 8.1 (Oreo) upgradable to Android 10, MIUI 12 GPU: Adreno 630 RAM: 6 GB Memori internal (ROM): 64GB/128GB Dimensi: 155.5 x 75.3 x 8.8 mm Berat: 182 gram Kamera depan: 20 MP, f/2.0, (wide); HDR; Video: 1080p@30fps Kamera belakang: Dual Camera; 12 MP, f/1.9, dual pixel PDAF; 5 MP, f/2.0, (depth); Dual-LED Flash, HDR, Panorama Video: 4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30fps (gyro-EIS), 1080p@240fps, 720p@960fps Baterai: Li-Po 4000 mAh; Fast charging 18W; Quick Charge 3.0 SIM: Hybrid Dual SIM; Nano-SIM WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot Bluetooth: 5.0, A2DP, LE, aptX HD GPS: A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS USB: USB Type-C 2.0; USB On-The-Go Sensor: Infrared Face ID, fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass Rilis: Agustus 2018

Harga Rp.3.250.000,- Ukuran layar: 6.67 inci FHD+ DotDisplay IPS LCD, 1080 x 2400 piksel, 395 ppi, 450 nits (typ), refresh rate 120Hz, dilindungi Corning Gorilla Glass 6, L1 Widevine Chipset: Qualcomm Snapdragon 860 (7 nm) CPU: Octa-core (1x2.96 GHz Kryo 485 Gold dan 3x2.42 GHz Kryo 485 Gold dan 4x1.78 GHz Kryo 485 Silver) GPU: Adreno 640 OS: Android 11, MIUI 12 for POCO RAM: 6GB/8GB Memori internal: 128GB/256GB teknologi UFS 3.1 Ukuran HP: 165.3 x 76.8 x 9.4 mm Bobot HP: 215 gram Kamera depan: 20 MP, f/2.2, (wide), 1/3.4", 0.8µm Kamera utama: 48 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 1/2.0", 0.8µm, PDAF; 8 MP, f/2.2, 119˚ (ultrawide), 1.0µm; 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro); 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth) Video: 4K 30fps, 1080p 30/60/120/240fps, 1080p 960fps, gyro-EIS Konektivitas: NFC, IR Blaster Baterai: Li-Po 5160 mAh, Fast charging 33W Rilis: Maret 2021

Harga Rp.700.000,- Ukuran HP: 147.5 x 71.5 x 8.3 mm Berat HP: 145 gram Ukuran layar: 5,45 inci IPS LCD (~72.7% screen-to-body ratio) Resolusi layar: 720 x 1440 pixels, 18:9 ratio (~295 ppi density) Kamera depan: 5 MP, f/2.2; LED flash, HDR, panorama Kamera belakang: 13 MP, f/2.2 Video: 1080p@30fps Chipset: Mediatek MT6761 Helio A22 (12 nm) CPU: QuadCcore 2.0 GHz Cortex-A53 GPU: PowerVR GE8320 OS: Android 8.1 (Oreo), planned upgrade to Android 10, MIUI 12 RAM: 2GB/3 GB Memori internal: 16 GB/32 GB Memori eksternal: microSDXC (dedicated slot) sampai 256 GB Baterai: Non-removable Li-Ion 3000 mAh WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS Tanggal rilis: September 2018
